sentences: Jo Jae-yoon (born September 15, 1974) is a South Korean actor.

He made his acting debut in 2003 and has since starred as a supporting actor in numerous films and television series, including The Man from Nowhere (2010), The Chaser (2012), Gu Family Book (2013), and The Suspect (2013).
Jo also appears in the variety-reality show Animals (2015).
